title: Minimal Watch Face
summary: An elegant and minimalistic Watch Face. Clean Design. Dynamic Red Details.
description: Sleek and minimalistic watch face featuring date and week day indication.Very battery-efficient thanks to its black base color.Awesome!Great on round and square watches.FEATURES:-COMPLETEY FREE and NO ADS-Date-Week Day-Hour, Minute and Second Hand xD-Minimal Design-Sporty AppearanceDesigned by LuRIs in WÃ¼rzburg.Perfect on: Moto 360, Huawei Watch, G Watch R, Tag Heuer Connected, Fossil Q Founder, Zenwatch, Sony Smartwatch 3.
descriptionHTML:
Sleek and minimalistic watch face featuring date and week day indication.

Very battery-efficient thanks to its black base color.

Awesome!

Great on round and square watches.

FEATURES:
-COMPLETEY FREE and NO ADS
-Date
-Week Day
-Hour, Minute and Second Hand xD
-Minimal Design
-Sporty Appearance

Designed by LuRIs in Würzburg.

Perfect on: Moto 360, Huawei Watch, G Watch R, Tag Heuer Connected, Fossil Q Founder, Zenwatch, Sony Smartwatch 3.
comments: The watch face look perfect on a square screen. Perfect as in the pictures!
Simply and perfectly match on my LG Urbane 2
